info.name: Banking System
info.description:
## Banking System API
*Mid Term project for Ironhack Bootcamp*

request.description: Get all the ``Account``. Method only available for Admin role.

response.name: Get Accounts

request.description: Create an ``AccountHolder`` than inherits from ``User``. Must be an Admin for this request.

response.name: New Request
response.body:
{
    "username": "mike",

}

request.description: Creates a ``CheckingAccount`` unless the ``AccountHolder`` age is below 24 years old. In that case, a ``StudentCheckingAccount`` is created. Must be an Admin for this request

request.description: A ``ThirdParty`` is created. Must be an admin for this request.

response.name: New Request

item.name: Get Account Holder ID by Username

request.description: Gets the ``AccountHolder`` ``Id`` to use in other requests. Must be an admin for this request.

response.name: New Request
response.body: {"accountHolderId": 2}

request.description:
Gets all the information of a certain ``Account``, whether it's a ``CheckingAccount``, ``StudentCheckingAccount``, ``SavingsAccount`` or ``CreditCardAccount``.
Logged users (``AccountHolder``) can access only to their own accounts. Admin can access to every account.

response.name: New Request

request.description: Gets a list of all the ``CheckingAccount``. Must be an admin for this request.

response.name: New Request

request.description: Gets a list of ``ThirdParty``. Must be an admin for this request.
Gets the Balance of all the ``Account`` the user has. Ownership is consider both as a ``PrimaryOwner`` or a ``SecondaryOwner``.

response.name: [User] Get Account

request.description: Gets the Balance of a certain ``Account`` identified by its ``Id``. Users can only access to their own accounts' information (whether being a ``PrimaryOwner`` or a ``SecondaryOwner``).

response.name: [User] Get Account by ID

request.description:
Performs the transaction (transfer funds) from the indicated ``Account`` (indicated in the URL) to the ``Account`` indicated in the Body. User logged in must be the owner of the origin ``Account`` set in the URL.

*Important*
- Transactions performed on the same ``Account`` (origin account) in a period of 1 second or less will provoque the ``Account`` to be frozen due to anti-fraud policies.
- Transactions made in 24 hours that total to more than 150% of the customers highest daily total transactions in any other 24 hour period will provoque the freezing of the origin ``Account``.

response.name: Transfer b. Account Holders
response.body:
{
    "id": 2,
    "timeStamp": "2021-02-12T21:44:44.80943",
    "type": "transfer",
    "comments": "transfer between account holders",
    "funds": {
        "currency": "USD",
        "amount": 100
    },
    "originAccountHolder": {
        "username": "mike",
        "firstName": "Mike",
        "lastName": "Wazowski",
        "dateOfBirth": "2002-01-20",
        "street": "No name st.",
        "doorNumber": "2",
        "aptNumber": "3",
        "extraInfo": "",
        "city": "San Diego",
        "stateOrProvince": "CA",
        "postalCode": "90210",
        "country": "USA"
    },
    "originAccountId": 3,
    "originAccountType": "StudentCheckingAccount",
    "destinationAccountHolder": {
        "username": "forrest2",
        "firstName": "Forrest",
        "lastName": "Gump",
        "dateOfBirth": "1966-10-15",
        "street": "Alabama st.",
        "doorNumber": "23",
        "aptNumber": "",
        "extraInfo": "",
        "city": "",
        "stateOrProvince": "",
        "postalCode": "45120",
        "country": "USA"
    },
    "destinationAccountId": 1,
    "destinationAccountType": "CheckingAccount"
}

request.description:
Gets funds from a certain ``Account`` as a charge from a ``ThirdParty``. ``HashedKey`` from the ``ThirdParty`` must be included in the HTTP request's Header. 

*Important*
- Collections performed on the same ``Account`` (origin account) in a period of 1 second or less will provoque the ``Account`` to be frozen due to anti-fraud policies.
- Collections made in 24 hours that total to more than 150% of the customers highest daily total transactions in any other 24 hour period will provoque the freezing of the origin ``Account``.

response.name: Collect from Third Party
response.body:

request.description:
Gets all the ``Transaction`` where the indicated ``Account`` is the beneficiary, including all the possible origin ``Account``.
Users (``AccountHolder``) can only access to the information of their own accounts, in this case owning the beneficiary ``Account``. 
Admins can access to any ``Account`` information.

request.description:
Gets all the ``Transaction`` where the indicated ``Account`` is the origin of the funds, including all the possible destination ``Account``.
Users (``AccountHolder``) can only access to the information of their own accounts, in this case owning the origin ``Account``. 
Admins can access to any ``Account`` information.

response.name: New Request

item.name: Get Transactions by Account Holder ID

request.description:
Gets all the ``Transaction`` involving the ``AccountHolder``. The user logged in must be the ``AccountHolder`` to access the information.
Admins can access to any ``AccountHolder`` information

item.name: Get Transactions by Third Party ID

request.description: Gets all the ``Transaction`` made by a certain ``ThirdParty`` identified by its ``Id``. Must be an admin for this request.

response.name: Get Transactions by Third Party ID

request.description: Changes the ``Status`` of a certain ``Account`` identified by its ``Id``. Only two possible options in the *change-to* URL parameter: "active" or "frozen". Must be an admin for this request.

response.name: Change Account Status

request.description: Changes the ``Balance`` of a certain ``Account`` identified by its ``Id``. Must be an admin for this request

response.name: Change Status

request.description: Changes the ``PrimaryAddress`` of a certain ``AccountHolder`` identified by its ``Id``. The logged in user must be the ``AccountHolder``.
